page.title: 14SHOPPING IN USK
page.content: We did a survey of the use of the shops in{Usk.}Most people interviewed were locals and very few had travelled further than five miles.We found that most people did a{main shop}each week with about a of quarter of the people going monthly. Half of the people went shopping every three days for{fresh food.}Three quarters of the remainder went every day and the rest once a week. Everybody had a{fridge}for keeping food fresh and most had a{freezer. About{one fifth}had a{microwave which is becoming more popular, especially for cooking frozen meals quickly .Very handy for families when both parents work. While Usk was popular for{food and stationery,}very few shopped here for{clothes,furniture {and electrical goods.
